dialogue: And that's my suggestion for our next product.
How do we know that ten other companies aren't working on the same idea?
There are seven billion people on Earth. I'll bet a million of them had this idea.
It's irrational to think that any new product is likely to be a hit.
On the other hand, we only get paid if we pretend to be optimistic about new products.
All in favor of faking our optimism, raise your hands.
All I could get was fake buy-in.
That's the only kind there is.
